member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_EXTENSION_COMMAND_INFO.CommandId
member.summary: The unique identifier for the video extension command.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_EXTENSION_COMMAND_INFO.Name
member.summary: A pointer to a wide string containing the name of the command.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_EXTENSION_COMMAND_INFO.CommandListSupportFlags
member.summary: A member of the enumeration. Indicates the video command queue that the video extension targets. Only one value from the enumeration can be set.
